event.name: Atomik::Dispatchpluginapplication::Ready
event.description: Fired when a pluggable application configuration has been computed
event.refparam: The uri that will be used for the app

event.name: Atomik::Dispatchpluginapplication::Start
event.description: Fired before a pluggable application is going to be dispatched, after the Application.php file has been included
event.refparam: The uri that will be used for the app
